import { Meta } from "@storybook/addon-docs";
import productVocabularyImage from "./assets/addvscreate.png";
When and how to use words for our in-product experience. Refer to the

for an
overview of how we speak on behalf of the Jobber brand.
in reference to the SP's business' Jobber account.
Only the account owner can set up Jobber Payments
Your account can not set up Jobber Payments for this Jobber account
for individual users to reduce ambiguity.
on Jobber by creating your profile
's account by creating your own Jobber account
Always refer to this permission set as

permission for
consistency with what appears on
and we call the people they serve
All selected invoices have been emailed to your clients
All selected invoices have been emailed to your customers
Sometimes in product, the context makes sense to use

as terms our
integration partners use or as a blanket term for existing clients and new
leads.
Sync clients with active QuickBooks Online customers
Sync customers with active QuickBooks Online customers
users / team / team members / field worker

when referring to the account's user limit, permissions, or
individual team management.
This user will be over your account’s user limit
This person will be over your account's user limit
to refer to an individual directly.
Feedback from people like you will help us shape the future of this feature.
The feedback we receive from users like you will help shape the future of this feature.

or team when referring to assignments, time sheets and other
work specific areas.
No team members are currently assigned to this job
No users are currently assigned to this job

as this does not cover all company roles
appropriately.
Generally avoid referring to Jobber as

- focus on the user and what they
can do rather than on Jobber itself.
The Mailchimp integration could not be set up
We weren't able to set up your Mailchimp integration

when we are actually performing an action for the user or making a
suggestion.
We'll email you as soon as we hear back from the cardholder's bank
You'll receive an email when a response is given from the cardholder's bank
when referencing our teams, help center, or services we offer.
Jobber Payments is our seamless and secure online payment processor.
Jobber Payments is a seamless and secure online payment processor in Jobber

Referring to the user directly can help avoid awkward phrasing in our messaging.
Stay human.
You are over your plan’s user limit
This Jobber account is over the user limit of it's plan
For validation and inline errors, avoid saying the user caused the error.
Your entered deposit amount is invalid

Avoid spatial terms to direct users as they can be misinterpreted or irrelevant
depending on screen size, screen reader, and so on. Reference a call to action
and the component directly when possible.
Finish linking your Google and Jobber accounts by logging in
Finish linking your Google and Jobber accounts by logging in below
View the sample's details in the following list
Click on the request below to view it's details

when a user is generating something from scratch within
Jobber. Abbreviating to

when a user is adding something to an object in Jobber, even if that
object is being newly created.

(or an accessible back arrow icon) when progress
is saved at each step on a form (ie. Save and Continue).
in product tours or in pagination.
" as the accessible label for modals. Use
for modals where the user can lose changes, such as forms.

when permanently erasing information available in Jobber. Always
follow up with a confirmation dialog. Think of

when hiding information from the current view but not permanently
erasing it. Think of
Remove users over your plan limit
Delete users over your plan limit
Delete tax rate from group rate
unless Wreck-it Ralph is making a cameo.
enable / disable / turn on / turn off / connect / disconnect

for
controlling the availability of it on an account.
When referencing the apps in the App Marketplace, use

when data is moving in or out of Jobber and is
converted into a different format.

when data is being transferred in or out of
Jobber in the same format.

as a call to action when a user can acknowledge a message without
taking action on it, like in promo cards or onboarding.

when the same information is shown elsewhere in Jobber but not
copied to create a new version.
Link quote note to related invoice
Copy quote note to related invoice

when Jobber creates a new version that would have no effect on the
original when edited.

when describing receipts, forms or signatures being added to an
object. For file selection, use
Attach a receipt to this expense
Attach a receipt to this expense

in error messages or on error banner actions, for system or
connectivity errors. Although 'Reload' and 'Refresh' have the same meaning, use
'Refresh' for consistency.
at the end of a form on completion or

when individual changes or groups of changes can be saved inline
without needing to save a whole view or page.

when an account user is completing and sending a form to Jobber,
or when a service consumer is submitting a form to their service provider.

Use sync when a process with integration is active or to describe an integration
in a general way.
It appears the sync may have stalled
It appears the push may have stalled

when the sync is explicitly one-way with any aspect of
an integration.
All active items will be pulled from QuickBooks Online
All active items will be synced from QuickBooks Online
Stored cards will need to be re
Any vaulted cards will need to be re

In general, none of these should be capitalized unless explicitly stated or when
used in a page title.
address / property / service address / billing address

when referring to the service address, custom fields and tax
rate altogether.

instead of property address to
clearly differentiate between a

Use app when referring to the Jobber app itself, or the apps provided within the
App Marketplace. Apps in the Marketplace can also just be referred to by their
brand name.
Connect Mailchimp to your account to automate your marketing
Connect the Mailchimp integration to your account to automate your marketing.
Use integration when referring to how an app connects with Jobber.
The Mailchimp integration will be removed because the user who connected it to Jobber no longer has administrator permissions
The Mailchimp app will be removed because the user who connected it to Jobber no longer has administrator permissions

to describe both visits and assessments to service consumers
in emails and within client hub.

as the name for those distinct
items.

when referring to files as a grouping rather than singular
or as a verb.

Always refer to our service consumer portal as the customer's client hub. Stick
to sentence case, as it is a general term, not branded.
Changes will be visible in your client hub
Changes will be visible in your Client Hub
help center / help docs / help documentation / learn more

Use Help Center exclusively when linking to additional help documentation, and
link to the related document directly when possible.
Learn how disputes work and how to prevent them in our
Learn how disputes work and how to prevent them in our

as a link's label as it is poor for accessibility.
Stick to descriptive labels that give more context of where the link is taking a
user.
Learn how disputes work and how to prevent them in our
Want to know how disputes work and how to prevent them?
in title case, as it's our branded feature.

We always refer to our area for experimentation with new functionality as the
branded feature,
products and services / products & services / line items

(and avoid flipping the words) when referring to
the master list of them in body text, and sentences in general.
The exported products and services are attached in a CSV file
Attached are your exported products & services in a CSV file
Would you like to add recommended products and services based on your industry to your account?
Would you like to add recommended line items based on your industry to your account?

for titles and navigation to keep things short and
snappy.

to describe the groupings of products and services on a
quote, job or invoice.
Add product or service to quote

in reference to an SP’s individual recurring payment and
how it is managed.

as a verb referring to the act of choosing, or having
chosen, a plan.
when referring to all task items in Jobber.

as an action verb when
space is limited.

for the most part, particularly in error messages to avoid
overuse and loss of meaning.

sparingly when we're requesting the user to take additional
effort to resolve an issue, outside of standard errors.
Your card cannot be used to make this payment, please contact your card issuer
Your card cannot be used to make this payment

much like the word please, as they can lose meaning when
overused.
Client cannot have more than 1500 email addresses
Sorry, can not add email address. You may not have more than 1500 email addresses on a single client.
Avoid these words in general as they are redundant.
Please contact our Success team for more information
Please contact the success team for more information

Avoid defaulting to generic messages for invalid fields where possible, as they
can be unhelpful.

Sometimes we can't account for all states of an error though, in this case err
on using "valid".
The expiration year is invalid, please try again
